content.p: The Diplomas in Spanish DELE are official qualifications certifying the degree of competence and mastery of Spanish, granted by Instituto Cervantes on behalf of the Ministry of Education and Professional Training of Spain. The DELE Diplomas will be considered the official qualifications to acknowledge Spanish language competence for any professional or academic activity which requires an appropriate level of competence. Furthermore, they are complementary certifications to the programmes of statutory education in foreign languages in many countries and institutions, and they are also instrumental in aiding personal promotion in all academic areas and professional spheres. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8693 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
